alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 10:08PM MST until December 14 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: .Freezing rain has changed to light snow generally along and west of Highway 27 in northwest Kansas and all of northeast Colorado. Mixed wintry precipitation continues east to Highway 83, but may also change to snow during the overnight hours. Freezing fog is no longer a hazard, but visibility reductions to as low as a mile will occur in the light snow. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...a wintry mix of rain, freezing rain, sleet and snow will continue through the overnight hours. Additional accumulations of 1 to 4 inches of snow and less than a tenth of an inch of ice are expected. * WHERE...Portions of east central Colorado and northwest and west central Kansas. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
